channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Monitoring
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Monitoring

item.title: CVE-2018-1441|2024-09-16T18:39:34.243Z -- ibm -- monitoring
item.description: IBM Application Performance Management - Response Time Monitoring Agent (IBM Monitoring 8.1.3 and 8.1.4) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 139597.
